title: New Zealand Cycling
itinerary: Quiet country roads, spectacular glaciers, rugged coastlines, rolling hills—it’s all here and within reach. New Zealand boasts an amazing variety of landscapes and equally amazing culture. This adventure offers the perfect opportunity to experience the country’s remarkable landscapes and laid-back lifestyle.
description: Cycle from the Southern Alps to the ocean over 11 days of wild, dramatic backdrops.
included: Taste award-winning wine and Kiwi cuisine
Keep an eye out for sheep and albatross
Explore the university town of Dunedin and the adventure capital, Queenstown

images.title: Dip your feet in the beautiful glacial lake of Humantay
Visit the lesser-known picturesque ruins of Llactapata
Explore the fabled sanctuary of Machu Picchu
Cross over the 4660m Salkantay pass before descending into the cloud forest
